content:
571 
 
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    with 'O' level credit pass in Mathematics at not more 
than two (2) sittings.  
(xxxiv) UNN does not require Mathematics and does not 
accept Fine Art or Local languages.  
(xxxv) UYO, MADONNA, BIU, and BENIN accept 'O' level pass in 
Mathematics.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) BOWEN, ILORIN, UNN, BENIN, AAU and OAU require  
Literature in English plus any two (2) subjects.  
(ii) CUAB and ABU require Literature in English and any 
other Arts or Social Science subjects.  
(iii) EBSU requires Literature in English and either 
Government, History, CRS or Economics.  
(iv) IBADAN accepts Science subjects.  
(v) LAGOS accepts any three (3) Arts or Social Science 
subjects. Does not accept Music, Fine Arts, and 
Principles of Accounting. Accepts either Economics or 
Commerce but not both.  
(vi) OOU does not insist on Literature in English.  
(vii) PHC requires Literature in English and any two (2) 
subjects from Economics, Government, History, 
Geography, Commerce, Christian Religious Studies and 
Islamic Studies.  
(viii) RSUST requires History or Government and two (2) 
other subjects.  
  
  
ISLAMIC/SHARIA LAW  
ABU                                    
KSU  
MAIDUGURI        
  
PRIVATE & ISLAMIC LAW  
Two (2)  A’ level passes 
to include Islamic  
Studies or Arabic  
  
Five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes in Arts or Social 
Sciences to include English 
Language and Islamic 
Studies or Arabic.  
  
Any three (3) Arts 
or Social Science 
subjects including 
Arabic or Islamic  
Studies  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) BAYERO does not accept NCE.  
(ii) ILORIN accepts at 'A’ level passes in Islamic or Arabic 
with  Arts/Social Science subjects, Diploma in Law  upper 
credit, relevant degree of an accredited University or NCE 
with Arabic or Islamic Studies as major. Requires 
Distinction or credit grade where a Diploma is of  
Distinction, Credit, Merit and Pass grades
